fullplot: A group of teens including Cindy Campbell and Brenda Meeks are invited to spend a night in Hell House. Professor Oldman has convinced them it is for a school project, but the night won't go past quietly. Master Kane is long dead, but still plans on enjoying himself, especially with Alex Monday. When things really start getting bad, the gang must work together to find a way to capture this ghostly menace.
plot: Four teens are tricked by their professor into visiting a haunted house for a school project.
title: Scary Movie 2

tomatoes.consensus: Instead of being funny, this gross-out sequel plays like a sloppy, rushed-out product.
